text: The Castle Tour is a 1986 Swedish television film directed by Claes Eriksson and Lars Gustavsson and the second film to star the members of Galenskaparna och After Shave. ==Plot== Some tourists are shown around an old castle (Tjolöholm Castle) by a guide (Peter Rangmar), who speaks a homemade version of English that cannot be understood, not knowing the tourists are Swedish. For example, the guide calls the upper class "Bimbodocksockers". During the tour, the group comes upon various events, which the guide does not know is happening. ==Cast== * Peter Rangmar - The guide to the castle * Jan Rippe - Tourist with a candy bag * Kerstin Granlund - Tourist * Per Fritzell - A tourist with an interest in the woman (Kerstin Granlund) * Anders Eriksson - The tourist with survival equipment * Claes Eriksson - Tourist with a camera * Knut Agnred - Tourist with his son (Erik Wingquist) * Erik Wingquist - Young guy * Marianne Östlund - clerk * Barbro Appelgren - maid ==Other websites== * * The Castle Tour | Kulturtuben Category:Swedish movies Category:1986 movies
title: The Castle Tour
